meanings.definition: An abnormal increase in the number of lymphocytes in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with lymphocytosis after analyzing the blood test results.
meanings.sent2: Lymphocytosis can indicate an underlying infection or immune system disorder.
meanings.sent3: When the vampire saw the lymphocytosis levels, he realized he hit the jackpot for a healthy meal.
meanings.sent4: Her lymphocytosis was like an army of soldiers ready to fight off any invaders in her body.
meanings.sent5: The image of the blood teeming with lymphocytosis painted a vivid picture of the body's defense system.

meanings.definition: The condition of having an elevated level of lymphocytes in the body.
meanings.sent1: The patient's lymphocytosis was a concern for the medical team monitoring his health.
meanings.sent2: Lymphocytosis is often a sign of the body's immune response to an infection.
meanings.sent3: At the lymphocytosis party, everyone had an extra bounce in their step, feeling super immune.
meanings.sent4: Her lymphocytosis was a shield protecting her from the harmful invaders lurking around.
meanings.sent5: The glow of health radiated from her skin, a result of the lymphocytosis working tirelessly within her.
